name: Sequential Pipeline
description: A multi-step sequential workflow where each node processes data in order. Output of one node becomes input to the next.

sample_inputs.query: Analyze the trends in remote work adoption over the past 5 years and predict future developments.
sample_inputs.input: Analyze the trends in remote work adoption over the past 5 years and predict future developments.

sample_inputs.query: Review the key factors affecting urban transportation systems.
sample_inputs.input: Review the key factors affecting urban transportation systems.

sample_inputs.query: Examine the evolution of communication technologies.
sample_inputs.input: Examine the evolution of communication technologies.
